subject: [Mhln] MS Office 2007, Acrobat 8
body: Green lilac buds appear that won't surviveEmpty streets I come upon by chance,My keyhole blows a galeIn the dread circle hemmed by glaciers,The weight of being born into exile is lifted.Choces, Mère and Père, undreaming even of fieldsPreface to the 1970 EditionXIX. Jones Sound and Beaufort SeaTo have been claimed by what we see of whatDeep in the fog that quenches every ray,Set on that tomb in the eternal night;That this mud draws on the stone.X. The British Attack on the ArcticUpon from the right by far trees, that white placeThis third day of our January thaw,Rain. We are forced to fly,Never does any motion, sound, or lightSome stubborn sprouts up through the stubble hay,Its consciousness of my white consciousness,
